name: Seek Out
description:
First year group project at creajeux programmed in smfl c.
Constraints were to create a board game and adapt it into a video-game.

This is a turn based game where 3 seekers try to find and kill the last player trying to hide himself and kill all others players.

The 3 seekers can't see the hider but can try their luck at attacking at any tiles they can reach.

Each turn the players rolls their dice and can use their points to do movement, basic attack or ultimate attack.

The 4 differents characters present in-game possess their own basic and ultimate abilities.

Team:

5 Devs and 5 graphs
